Source.Name: template-glib
Source.Summary: Template-GLib is a library to help you generate text based on a template and user defined state.
Source.Description: Template-GLib is a library to help you generate text based on a template and user defined state. Template-GLib does not use a language runtime, so it is safe to use from any GObject-Introspectable language.
